Package ibo1.UI

Class StartUpController

java.lang.Object
ibo1.UI.StartUpController
public class StartUpController extends Object
StartUpController - Is the controller for the StartUp.fxml file, defining which methods the buttons can refer to. This is the starting point of the User Interface, and extends to the rest of the User Interface files.

It is used to call methods depending on which buttons are pressed on the home page.

Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim

      private void connectToServer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Connects to the server and when connection is successful switches to the Login scene.
      Parameters:
      event - Used to switch to Log-in scene.
      Throws:
